itemDescription: Scottish minister, mathematician, astronomer and author of church history

wikipedia_page.main: Rev Adam Mitchell Hunter FRSE DLitt (1871–1955) was a Scottish minister, mathematician, astronomer and author of church history.

response: In 1929 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh. His proposers were Sir Edmund Taylor Whittaker, Ralph Allan Sampson, Adam Mitchell Hunter and John Edwin MacKenzie.
*Adam Mitchell Hunter (1871–1955), Scottish minister, mathematician, astronomer and author of church history
Reverend Adam Mitchell Hunter who was ordained as minister of the Parish of Cardross in 1897 wrote an article about The Cardross Case in the journal Scottish Church History in 1941.
